outcome: Technocratic Purists take control, escalating system failures while Military Pragmatists tighten security.

events.description: Technocratic Purists assume control over BCI system, initiating aggressive updates to attempt stabilization.
BCI malfunction causes public transport to randomly assign destinations, increasing public anxiety and confusion.
Military Pragmatists declare a temporary city-wide curfew, citing security concerns amid system chaos.
Smart appliances erratically impose energy restrictions leading to widespread household discomfort and dissatisfaction.
